column3: Traffic;Kandal:------ A big truck crashed at 6:45 pm on March 5
column4: 2019 at the roundabout of the bridge of Prek Kdam
column5: on National Highway 8 in Kandal Province.------The vehicle crashed after crossing the bridge
column6: causing damage to the vehicle and destroying the state-built public property.------Authorities have yet to confirm the extent of damage
column7: but the driver must have been well enough after the crash to escape on foot.------The car is being pulled from the scene to prevent traffic congestion and wait for the owner to resolve the matter. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/418814
